resources.string: The path of the P12 certificate you wish to use, placed in the \"Plumble\" folder on external storage.
The password for your PKCS12 certificate. (optional)
The way audio is sent to the server.
The call mode of Plumble, whether to act as a voice call or speakerphone.
The minimum amplitude required for voice to be detected (only applicable for voice activity).
A hardware key to bind to Push to Talk. (optional)
A specified corner of the screen that, when pressed down, will push to talk throughout Android.
The theme of the app\'s channel view.
Definiuje czy wymuszać połączenie TCP (wyłącza UDP).
Bitrate dźwięku, którego będzie używał Plumble (w kbit/s)
Show notifications when a user posts in chat.
Generates a new self-signed Plumble certificate. Recommended for beginners.
Configure Push to Talk if it is enabled.
Configure Voice Activity if it is enabled.
Disable Opus support for Mumble 1.2.4 servers. Enable if you\'re having difficulties with audio on 1.2.4 servers.
Hides the push to talk button when in push to talk mode. Useful if you use hot corners or a hardware key exclusively.
Toggles push to talk on and off when pressed.
Automatically try to re-establish a connection when the server connection is lost.
Naciśnij sprzętowy przycisk by go wybrać.
Uwaga: Ze względu na ograniczenia w systemie Android aplikacja musi być otwarta, aby można było używać sprzętowego przycisku.
